flavorText: Some refused to leave their shattered homes, vowing to rebuild at any cost.

foreignData.flavorText: Nicht jeder war gewillt, sein Heim zu verlassen. Egal, wie wenig davon übrig war.
foreignData.name: Bewahrerin der Hoffnung
foreignData.text:
{1}, {T}: Enttappe ein Land deiner Wahl.
{1}, {T}, erschöpfe die Bewahrerin der Hoffnung: Enttappe zwei Länder deiner Wahl. (Eine erschöpfte Kreatur enttappt nicht während deines nächsten Enttappsegments.)

foreignData.flavorText: Hubo quienes se negaron a abandonar sus hogares destruidos y juraron reconstruirlos a cualquier precio.
foreignData.name: Cuidadora de la esperanza
foreignData.text:
{1}, {T}: Endereza la tierra objetivo.
{1}, {T}, espolear a la Cuidadora de la esperanza: Endereza dos tierras objetivo. (Una criatura espoleada no se enderezará durante tu próximo paso de enderezar.)

foreignData.flavorText: Certains refusèrent d'abandonner leurs maisons détruites, jurant de reconstruire à tout prix.
foreignData.name: Marraine de l'espoir
foreignData.text:
{1}, {T} : Dégagez le terrain ciblé.
{1}, {T}, surmenez la Marraine de l'espoir : Dégagez deux terrains ciblés. (Une créature surmenée ne se dégage pas pendant votre prochaine étape de dégagement.)

foreignData.flavorText: Alcuni rifiutarono di abbandonare le loro case ridotte in macerie e giurarono di ricostruirle a qualsiasi costo.
foreignData.name: Custode della Speranza
foreignData.text:
{1}, {T}: STAPpa una terra bersaglio.
{1}, {T}, Strema la Custode della Speranza: STAPpa due terre bersaglio. (Una creatura stremata non STAPpa durante il tuo prossimo STAP.)

foreignData.flavorText: 家が粉々になってもそこを離れようとしない人々もいた。どれだけ苦労しても再建しようというのだ。
foreignData.name: 希望守り
foreignData.text:
{1}, {T}：土地１つを対象とし、それをアンタップする。
{1}, {T}, 希望守りを督励する：土地２つを対象とし、それらをアンタップする。（督励されたクリーチャーは、あなたの次のアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ドルイド

foreignData.flavorText: 어떤 이들은 떠나기를 거부하고 산산이 조각난 집을 기필코 재건하겠다고 다짐했다.
foreignData.name: 희망 관리인
foreignData.text:
{1}, {T}: 대지를 목표로 정한다. 그 대지를 언탭한다.
{1}, {T}, 희망 관리인을 분전시킨다: 대지 두 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 대지들을 언탭한다. (분전한 생물은 당신의 다음 언탭단에 언탭되지 않는다.)

foreignData.flavorText: Alguns se recusaram a deixar seus lares despedaçados, jurando reconstruí-los a qualquer preço.
foreignData.name: Cuidadora da Esperança
foreignData.text:
{1}, {T}: Desvire o terreno alvo.
{1}, {T}, exaura Cuidadora da Esperança: Desvire dois terrenos alvo. (Uma criatura exaurida não será desvirada durante sua próxima etapa de desvirar.)

foreignData.flavorText: Нашлись те, кто отказался покинуть разрушенные дома, поклявшись любой ценой отстроить их заново.
foreignData.name: Хранительница Надежды
foreignData.text:
{1}, {T}: разверните целевую землю.
{1}, {T}, подстегните Хранительницу Надежды: разверните две целевые земли. (Подстегнутое существо не разворачивается во время вашего следующего шага разворота.)

foreignData.flavorText: 有些人拒绝离开自己破碎的家园，誓言不惜代价重建。
foreignData.name: 育望师
foreignData.text:
{1}，{T}：重置目标地。
{1}，{T}，耗竭育望师：重置两个目标地。（已耗竭的生物于你的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。）

foreignData.flavorText: 有些人拒絕離開自己破碎的家園，誓言不惜代價重建。
foreignData.name: 育望師
foreignData.text:
{1}，{T}：重置目標地。
{1}，{T}，耗竭育望師：重置兩個目標地。（已耗竭的生物於你的下一個重置步驟中不能重置。）

name: Hope Tender
originalText:
{1}, {T}: Untap target land.
{1}, {T}, Exert Hope Tender: Untap two target lands. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

rulings.text: You can’t exert a creature unless an effect allows you to do so. Similar effects that “tap and freeze” a creature (such as that of Decision Paralysis) don’t exert that creature.

If an exerted creature is already untapped during your next untap step (most likely because it had vigilance or an effect untapped it), exert’s effect preventing it from untapping expires without having done anything.
If you gain control of another player’s creature until end of turn and exert it, it will untap during that player’s untap step.

Some cards in the Hour of Devastation set let you exert a creature as a cost to activate one of its abilities. You can exert it to pay that cost even if you’ve already exerted it earlier in the turn. Exerting it multiple times will keep it tapped only during your next untap step.

text:
{1}, {T}: Untap target land.
{1}, {T}, Exert Hope Tender: Untap two target lands. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
